Articles.Content:
I perfectly understand than it's a low priority for the game actually. But i want to send my feedback for the model of all chute of KSP2, and i'm happy to see what other player think about that.

The chute line of the chute feel way too short, in fact the line just don't exist, wich make the chute colliding with the spacecraft, vissually weird and confusing.

That need to update the model, but not so much.

( Of course i also hope we could get colliding chute with eachother like in KSP1 one day )
+1 this, but ha, you beat me to it. I was just thinking about this thing and was gonna sketch some stuff too
